nodes.excerpt: QuotaPath has integrated with HubSpot! With this CRM integration, sales reps can track quota attainment & earnings in real-time. Import HubSpot deals to automate the commission process. Close more deals, grow your revenue, and motivate your team.
nodes.title: QuotaPath + HubSpot integration - Calculate earnings & attainment from HubSpot deals
nodes.author: Darby Dupre

localize.description: QuotaPath已与HubSpot整合! 有了这个CRM集成，销售代表可以实时跟踪配额的实现和收益。导入HubSpot交易以自动化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，并激励您的团队。
localize.tagline: 计算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。

localize.description: QuotaPath已與HubSpot整合! 有了這個CRM集成，銷售代表可以實時跟蹤配額的實現和收益。導入HubSpot交易以自動化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，並激勵您的團隊。

nodes.excerpt: ABBYY FineScanner AI is the best in class scanning app that turns your mobile device into a productivity tool to quickly capture documents and books, create digital copies in PDF and DOCX, and recognize text on scans for further editing and sharing.
nodes.title: ABBYY FineScanner AI 8 - Smart scanner app to make your remote work easy
nodes.author: Stewart Rogers

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同类扫描应用中的佼佼者，它能将您的移动设备变成生产力工具，快速捕捉文档和书籍，创建PDF和DOCX格式的数字副本，并识别扫描件上的文本，以便进一步编辑和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能扫描仪应用，让你的远程工作更轻松

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同類掃描應用中的佼佼者，它能將您的移動設備變成生產力工具，快速捕捉文檔和書籍，創建PDF和DOCX格式的數字副本，並識別掃描件上的文本，以便進一步編輯和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能掃描儀應用，讓你的遠程工作更輕鬆

nodes.excerpt: 😺 PH Launch KIT is an all in one product for makers, indiehackers and product owners who feel frustrated with launching on Product Hunt. 2 months on R&D, detailed 25-step launch guide, 1300+ Design Assets, exclusive community for creators and more!

nodes.excerpt: Your resume is the most important part of your job search, but also one of the hardest to get right. Rezi makes it easy for you with our AI-powered resume builder that generates perfect resume content for you. TL;DR: Nice
nodes.title: Rezi 3.0 - GPT-3 resume builder

nodes.excerpt: Rollcall makes it easy to organize remote meetings with people in any timezone. Add to Slack, create an agenda, schedule a timeframe and the Rollcall bot collects your standup in text, audio-only, screen share and video formats.
nodes.title: Rollcall - Asynchronous standup meetings in Slack.
nodes.author: Mike McMillan

localize.description: Rollcall可以让您轻松组织任何时区的远程会议。添加到Slack，创建一个议程，安排一个时间框架，Rollcall机器人以文本，纯音频，屏幕共享和视频格式收集你的摊位。
localize.tagline: Slack中的异步站立会议。

localize.description: Rollcall可以讓您輕鬆組織任何時區的遠程會議。添加到Slack，創建一個議程，安排一個時間框架，Rollcall機器人以文本，純音頻，屏幕共享和視頻格式收集你的攤位。
localize.tagline: Slack中的異步站立會議。

nodes.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
nodes.title: Agree - Polls with friends
nodes.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票应用，帮助你与朋友和同事达成共同的决定。创建和分享投票，只需向右滑动投赞成票，向左滑动投反对票。一旦大家都投了票，获胜的选项就会以通知的形式弹出。
localize.tagline: 与朋友一起投票

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票應用，幫助你與朋友和同事達成共同的決定。創建和分享投票，只需向右滑動投贊成票，向左滑動投反對票。一旦大家都投了票，獲勝的選項就會以通知的形式彈出。
localize.tagline: 與朋友一起投票

nodes.title: Pal - No-code user onboarding for all your flutter apps
nodes.author: mcfly

localize.description: 有没有想在没有代码的情况下展示一个入职培训？点击按钮就能显示营销信息？现在你有了朋友。
localize.tagline: 您所有的flutter应用程序的无代码用户上岗。

localize.description: 有沒有想在沒有代碼的情況下展示一個入職培訓？點擊按鈕就能顯示營銷信息？現在你有了朋友。
localize.tagline: 您所有的flutter應用程序的無代碼用戶上崗。

nodes.excerpt: Habit tracker that helps you improve your life & reach goals What can Timecap do? ⏱️ Time tracker – set a timer for anything you want to track ✅ Check off activities – quick & easy way to mark things done 5️⃣ Counter – count how many times you do an activity
nodes.title: Timecap 2 - An app to track your habits and reach your goals
nodes.author: João Gonçalves

localize.description: 习惯追踪器，帮助你改善生活和达到目标 Timecap能做什么？⏱️时间追踪器--为任何你想追踪的事情设置一个定时器 ✅勾选活动--快速简单的方式来标记已完成的事情 5️⃣计数器--计算你做了多少次活动。
localize.tagline: 一款追踪你的习惯和达到你的目标的应用程序。

localize.description: 習慣追蹤器，幫助你改善生活和達到目標 Timecap能做什麼？⏱️時間追蹤器--爲任何你想追蹤的事情設置一個定時器 ✅勾選活動--快速簡單的方式來標記已完成的事情 5️⃣計數器--計算你做了多少次活動。
localize.tagline: 一款追蹤你的習慣和達到你的目標的應用程序。
